snippet: Former Chelsea striker Didier Drogba has said he is discussing his future with Major League Soccer team Montreal Impact but that retirement talk was premature....

headline.main: Montreal Striker Drogba Undecided on Playing Future
headline.print_headline: Montreal Striker Drogba Undecided on Playing Future

lead_paragraph: Former Chelsea striker Didier Drogba has said he is discussing his future with Major League Soccer team Montreal Impact but that retirement talk was premature.

snippet: Mark Hughes, the bookmakers' favourite to be the first managerial casualty of the new Premier League season, has received the backing of Stoke City chairman Peter Coates despite the club's miserable start to the campaign....

headline.main: Stoke Chairman Backs Hughes to Deliver Despite Poor Start
headline.print_headline: Stoke Chairman Backs Hughes to Deliver Despite Poor Start

lead_paragraph: Mark Hughes, the bookmakers' favourite to be the first managerial casualty of the new Premier League season, has received the backing of Stoke City chairman Peter Coates despite the club's miserable start to the campaign.

snippet: Former Germany midfielder Bastian Schweinsteiger has returned to training with Manchester United's first-team squad despite manager Jose Mourinho saying it would be "very difficult" for the World Cup winner to feature in his plans....

headline.main: Schweinsteiger Returns to Training With Man United First Team
headline.print_headline: Schweinsteiger Returns to Training With Man United First Team

lead_paragraph: Former Germany midfielder Bastian Schweinsteiger has returned to training with Manchester United's first-team squad despite manager Jose Mourinho saying it would be "very difficult" for the World Cup winner to feature in his plans.

snippet: Arsenal midfielder Francis Coquelin is expecting an underperforming Manchester United to rise to the occasion when the sides meet at Old Trafford in the Premier League on Sunday....

headline.main: Coquelin Expects United to Be Gunning for Arsenal
headline.print_headline: Coquelin Expects United to Be Gunning for Arsenal

lead_paragraph: Arsenal midfielder Francis Coquelin is expecting an underperforming Manchester United to rise to the occasion when the sides meet at Old Trafford in the Premier League on Sunday.

snippet: Injured Manchester City defender Pablo Zabaleta is targeting a return to full fitness in time for his team's trip to play second-placed Liverpool in the Premier League on Dec. 31....

headline.main: Zabaleta Hoping to Recover in Time to Face Liverpool
headline.print_headline: Zabaleta Hoping to Recover in Time to Face Liverpool

lead_paragraph: Injured Manchester City defender Pablo Zabaleta is targeting a return to full fitness in time for his team's trip to play second-placed Liverpool in the Premier League on Dec. 31.

snippet: Burnley striker Ashley Barnes has signed a three-year contract extension to 2019, the newly-promoted Premier League club said on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Burnley striker Ashley Barnes has signed a three-year contract extension to 2019, the newly-promoted Premier League club said on Friday.

snippet: Manchester United midfielder Marouane Fellaini and Leicester City defender Robert Huth have been charged by the Football Association (FA) with violent conduct for an incident during Sunday's 1-1 Premier League draw....

headline.main: Fellaini and Huth Charged With Violent Conduct by FA
headline.print_headline: Fellaini and Huth Charged With Violent Conduct by FA

lead_paragraph: Manchester United midfielder Marouane Fellaini and Leicester City defender Robert Huth have been charged by the Football Association (FA) with violent conduct for an incident during Sunday's 1-1 Premier League draw.

snippet: Goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel believes last season's battle to avoid relegation has given Premier League leaders Leicester City plenty of experience in coping with the pressure of trying to claim a maiden top flight title....

headline.main: Relegation Battle Tougher Than Title Chase-Schmeichel
headline.print_headline: Relegation Battle Tougher Than Title Chase-Schmeichel

lead_paragraph: Goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel believes last season's battle to avoid relegation has given Premier League leaders Leicester City plenty of experience in coping with the pressure of trying to claim a maiden top flight title.

snippet: Strength in depth has been the key to Tottenham Hotspur's success in the early part of the season, defender Jan Vertonghen has said....

headline.print_headline: Strength in Depth Gives Spurs an Edge, Says Vertonghen

lead_paragraph: Strength in depth has been the key to Tottenham Hotspur's success in the early part of the season, defender Jan Vertonghen has said.

snippet: Striker Romelu Lukaku is likely to return for Everton's Premier League clash at Bournemouth this weekend, manager Ronald Koeman has said....

headline.main: Everton's Lukaku Set to Return for Bournemouth Clash
headline.print_headline: Everton's Lukaku Set to Return for Bournemouth Clash

lead_paragraph: Striker Romelu Lukaku is likely to return for Everton's Premier League clash at Bournemouth this weekend, manager Ronald Koeman has said.
